div.p: Longhorn PHP is returning for its 3rd year in Austin, TX! We are a community-run conference for PHP developers in Texas and beyond. We are excited to bring PHP developers from all backgrounds together again for 3 days of fun and education.
We are currently accepting submissions for 50 minute talks and 3 hour tutorials. Talk ideas will be accepted until June 30, 2021.
While the CFP is open, we also have our Blind Bird tickets available for sale. Register now!
Follow us on Twitter, or signup for emails at longhornphp.com to get notified with important conference updates.
